title: Crush it!
dis: Crush It! is a personal workout tracking application that will allow the user to setup an account, create a workout routine by selecting from a range of exercises, and track your progress compared to previous sessions. The app was deployed on Heroku.
tech: Technologies used: JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, Handlebars

title: Work Day Scheduler
dis: The application allows a user to save events for each hour of the day using moment.js..
tech: Technologies used: JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3
